cast.name: 宝琳娜·加西亚 Paulina García
克拉拉·拉雷恩  Clara Larrain
帕特丽夏·库尤尔 Patricia Cuyul
阿玛莉亚·卡西尼 Amalia Kassai

writer.name: 马蒂亚斯·罗哈斯·瓦伦西亚 Matías Rojas Valencia

director.name: 马蒂亚斯·罗哈斯·瓦伦西亚 Matías Rojas Valencia

introduction: A senior couple lives isolated in Patagonia. They are the survivors of Colonia Dignidad, a German “School” settled during the Chilean Dictatorship. Their only purpose is to live in the present while battling the fear of being forgotten. Meanwhile, a woman facing an imminent loss of memory, tries to deliver a secret, asking for forgiveness for the guilt she has carried her whole life.Colonia Dignidad closed a long time ago and the enslaved children that grew up there are now adults. What do you do after such a deep trauma?Memory, wounds, redemption, scars, fiction, and reality are all different layers of the fascinating Russian doll which is this movie, an engaging and captivating jigsaw that will move you. One thing is certain, Matias Rojas’s skilful eye turns past traumas into enthralling films.Javier Garcia Puerto源自：https://poff.ee/en/film/winter-howl/
